name: WC Call Center
tagline: Direct marketing for pros, by professionals.
description:
West Coast Call Center was founded by three professionals with over 40 years of combined industry experience and backgrounds covering all aspects of the industry from technology and sales, to customer service and training. They have endeavored to create a company that addresses the shortcomings of other providers. The result of their knowledge and experience is a campaign which is ran the way you would do it internally if you had the time, resources and expertise to run a call center.
